ee thiranaya ganena kriyawaliya siddha wenne kesedayi oppu kara penwannata pudgalayeku ho kamituwak ho kisima widyagnyayek thawama samath wi natha.

eheth ada wana wita eki manga gaman kala wu tharunayanta, thriwil riyaduran, yathuru padikaruwanta, riyaduranta aya darshanaya wi athi bawa aya ge dasunen biyata pathwu ayage ruwa dutu tharuna pirisak me wana wita owunge athdakim sathya bawa ekahelama thahawuru kara atha.
me eekabaddha wipakshaya sadi thiyenne aparadha, dushana, wancha kala pirisakage ekathuwen.
ethumata ara apa yojana kala namaya laba di athi bawata aaranchiyak weda?

lalith kugan paharaganimen anathuruwa ekala kabinat madhya pa්rakashaka keheliya rambaukwalla mahatha desambar 15 dina pawathi kabinat thirana danumdime madhya hamuwedi pawasa thibune, lalith ha kugan athurudan wi nathi bawayi.
welendapola wiwrutha wenawata eyala kamathi naha.
“mage ammata saha thaththata, meka ohuta magen thaggak.
ehema wune mage me ekama lathawata hin ...
prabhatha theme min pera daka nathuwata saka nathi.
api pawule hithawathun.
“misis arawinda mita kalin mawa dakala nathuwa athi.
man gawa widiyo ekak thiyenawa kotana thuwakkuwak lod karana.
“thamuseta wishwasada mawa kanna kiyala?“ “pissuda?
punchi kes rodak munata watila.
me sandaha prabala washayenma awashya wanne obema manasikathwaya jaya ganimayi.
kese wethath oba bhawitha karanne netwark ekakata sambhanda
mokada podu apekshakaya kawuda kiyala thora ganda baruwawathda?”
ma ma hara an siyallatama aadaraya karanne me nisaweni."ekanga wenna ba.ehema jiwithayak athaharinna sadharana hethuwak ?mama paudgalikawa ee adahasata wiraddhayi.

widuli sandesha kulunu idikirima widhimath kirima sandaha nirdeshayan labadimata wiwidha kshethrayan niyojanaya karana widwathun 16 denakugen samanwitha kamituwak, widuli sandesha niyamana komisama magin pihituwa thibe.
mage soyura rukshan karunanayaka.
apita thiya harakunta kanda eka thanakola gahak ithuru wune na.
aanduwe pacha horana neweyi …irak saha kombuwak thiyena ra7, 9.30 saha 10 niws.
thorathuru eekarashi kirime ha beda harime yam adupadu thibunath pa්rathama uthsahayak hatiyata sahasak nimawum pilibandawa ape pa්ranamaya komisame samastha karya mandalayata ma himi wiyu yuthuyi.

ee wagema rata danumen sannaddha weyi.hamuruwane, anagathaya yahapath wana adhyapanayak udesa anugamanaya kala yuthu wenne kumana aakaraye prathipaththiyak da?balanna, eda ada wage adhyapanaya sahathikawalata simawela no thibunata ee adhyapanaya labu aya sathutin jiwath wuna.

ara pas kandak buldosar karala, li watawal gahala kalawak mada thibba chek poyint ekedi bohoma aacharashiliwa sebalun math ekka hina wuna eke rahasath ekama thamayi.

namuth dan mata aata kiyanna hamadama kathawak thiyenawa. ?

anathuruwa, elesin puhunuwa lath guruwaru usas mattame puhunuwa sandaha peradeniyehi ingi්rasi puhunuwa sandaha wana shi්ra lanka indiya madhyasthanaya wetha yomu karanu labethi.niyamanaya kirime awashyathawajanadhipathithumage meheyawimen arambai rakiyabhimukha kathana ingi්rasi pa්rachalitha kirime parisha්ramaya nisi disawata yomu karalanu pinisa yam swarupayaka niyamanayak kirimath awashya wanneya.
me siyalla siduwanne minisuntayi.
ehema thamayi sahan,kathawala hatiyata wada na.suba pathumata sthuthiyi.
mama mage deweni putha ‘dinum’ta yojana kalemi.
aththa washayenma rajapaksha mahathage pa්rarambhayata sthuthi wannata mema samastha gataluwa desatama samaja awadhanaya yomukarawimata dan apata awasthawa labi thibe.

mema awasthawa sandaha uthurumada palath jeyashta niyojya polispathi jagath abesirigunawardhana mahatha, madhyama parisara adhikariye apadrawya kalamanakarana anshaye adhyaksha ajith wirasundara, danumwathkirime anshaye adhyaksha premarathna disanayaka, nithi eekakaye hitapu niyojya adhyaksha nithignya ruwan pathirana yana mahathwarun sahabhagi wuha.
ithin rata gedara yaddi mage sakku pahe kasi walin bara wela...
liwwe ugannannanko honda padamak....
